texts.name: Aquaron
texts.biography: Sea bishop Aquaron is one of the best organizers of the underwater magic community. He is the founder of a powerful guild of Sea bishops who study the practical application of water spells. He has spent quite a lot of time in the ministry of water altars, which has gained him great credibility among the sea bishops. In battle under his command they are a formidable force.

specialty.name: Sea Bishops
specialty.description: Increases Speed of any Sea Bishops by 1 and their Attack and defense skills by 5% for every 3 levels (rounded up).
